description: The AWS::VoiceID::Domain resource specifies an Amazon VoiceID Domain.

KmsKeyId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Update requires: No interruption

ServerSideEncryptionConfiguration.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Description.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Pattern: ^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-%@]*)$  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9_-]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

DomainId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 22  
Maximum Length: 22  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9]{22}$  
Update requires: No interruption
